comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:10.0a1) Gecko/20111015 Firefox/10.0a1
Build ID: 20111015031037

Steps to reproduce:

1)Created a second profile
2)Set profile chooser to show at startup
3)Ensured Firefox wasn't running
4)clicked a url in another program (or a webloc)
5)picked the profile I wanted to use


Actual results:

Firefox did not (even attempt to) display the webpage for the url used to launch it.


Expected results:

The webpage should have been loaded.
